wikipedia_page.main: Hugh McLeish (10 June 1948 – December 2004) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a forward in the Football League for Luton Town and in the Scottish League for Berwick Rangers. He was on the books of Dundee United and Sunderland without appearing in the league for either, and also played for New Blackburn Athletic, Stevenage Town and Wimbledon.
